DOC.brief_summary: A single center , randomize clinical trial conduct healthy adult ( 18-60 year ) evaluate safety immunogenicity study cell-mediated Immunity Sinovac 's H1N1 influenza A Vaccine ( PANFLU.1 ) Trivalent Inactivated Influenza Vaccine ( ANFLU ) .
DOC.brief_title: Sinovac , H1N1 Vaccine + Trivalent Inactivated Influenza Vaccine , Adults
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male female age 18 60 2 . Be able show legal identity card sake recruitment 3 . Volunteers able understand sign inform consent 1 . Cases , cure case close contact influenza A ( H1N1 ) virus 2 . History H1N1 vaccine seasonal influenza vaccine administration 3 . Women pregnancy , lactation pregnant 60 day 4 . Subject medical history following : allergic history , allergic ingredient vaccine , egg , egg protein , etc 5 . Serious adverse reaction vaccine anaphylaxis , hive , respiratory difficulty , angioedema , abdominal pain 6 . Autoimmune disease immunodeficiency 7 . Asthma unstable require emergent care , hospitalization intubation past two year require use oral intravenous corticosteroid 8 . Diabetes mellitus ( type I II ) , exception gestational diabetes 9 . History thyroidectomy thyroid disease require medication within past 12 month 10 . Serious angioedema episode within previous 3 year require medication previous two year 11 . Bleeding disorder diagnose doctor ( e.g . factor deficiency , coagulopathy , platelet disorder require special precaution ) significant bruise bleed difficulty IM injection blood draws 12 . Active malignancy treat malignancy reasonable assurance sustain cure malignancy likely recur period study 13 . Seizure disorder : Febrile seizure age two year old Seizures secondary alcohol withdrawal 3 year ago , A singular seizure require treatment within last 3 year 14 . Asplenia , functional asplenia condition result absence removal spleen 15 . GuillainBarre Syndrome 16 . Any history immunosuppressive medication cytotoxic medication inhale corticosteroid within past six month ( exception corticosteroid nasal spray allergic rhinitis topical corticosteroid acute uncomplicated dermatitis ) 17 . History blood product within 3 month dose 18 . Administration investigational research agent within 30 day dose 19 . Administration live attenuate vaccine within 30 day dose 20 . Administration subunit inactivate vaccine , e.g. , pneumococcal vaccine , allergy treatment antigen injection , within 14 day dose 21 . Be receive antiTB prophylaxis therapy currently 22 . Axillary temperature > 37.0 centigrade time dose 23 . Psychiatric condition precludes compliance protocol : Past present psychosis Past present bipolar disorder require therapy well control medication past two year Disorder require lithium Suicidal ideation occur within five year prior enrollment 24 . Any medical , psychiatric , social condition , occupational reason responsibility , judgment investigator , contraindication protocol participation impair volunteer 's ability give inform consent
